title: Omar Dorsey Interview and more
itunes:title: Omar Dorsey Interview and more
description:
Wednesday 8/15 - Today on the show we had Omar Dorsey from Queen Sugar stop by where he spoke about his role on the show, fatherhood and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a staples manager who accused a pregnant woman of stealing. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to for listeners to get a chance to ask Angela for some advice. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 8/15 - Today on the show we had Omar Dorsey from Queen Sugar stop by where he spoke about his role on the show, fatherhood and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a staples manager who accused a pregnant woman of stealing. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to for listeners to get a chance to ask Angela for some advice.
